wines.description: A remarkable 2021 bottling displaying elderflower and mineral. A versatile wine that pairs beautifully with food.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with subtle aromas of passion fruit and elderflower, followed by nuanced notes of grapefruit. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, citrus takes center stage, complemented by herbaceous and mineral. The polished texture and cohesive structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The extended finish is polished and zesty, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: This 2015 expression showcases blackcurrant and full-bodied. Perfect for current enjoyment or short-term cellaring.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with vibrant aromas of dark fruits and spice, followed by expressive notes of oak. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, balanced takes center stage, complemented by structured and fruit-forward. The refined texture and elegant structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The enduring finish is sophisticated and elegant, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: Crafted in 2022, this wine reveals cherry and red fruits. A wine that balances tradition with modern winemaking.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with expressive aromas of oak and earth, followed by elegant notes of floral. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, complex takes center stage, complemented by balanced and structured. The supple texture and refined structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The sustained finish is distinguished and persistent, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wines.productName: Chateau Bellerives Dubois Bordeaux  Mevushal (MD & DC)
wines.description: A distinguished contemporary bottling that presents tobacco and blackberry. Ideal for both casual sipping and special occasions.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with alluring aromas of floral and dark fruits, followed by refined notes of spice. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, fruit-forward takes center stage, complemented by complex and balanced. The luxurious texture and structured structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The impressive finish is memorable and smooth, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: From the 2021 vintage, expect vanilla and plum. Represents excellent value for this quality level.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with delicate aromas of spice and oak, followed by pure notes of earth. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, structured takes center stage, complemented by fruit-forward and complex. The silky texture and well-balanced structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The persistent finish is graceful and elegant, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: This 2022 selection delivers honeysuckle and bright acidity. Shows the hallmark characteristics of its terroir.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with pronounced aromas of petrol and honeysuckle, followed by complex notes of peach. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, bright acidity takes center stage, complemented by stone fruits and mineral. The velvety texture and harmonious structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The lingering finish is elegant and refined, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development
